title: RTP Control Protocol (RTCP) Extended Report (XR) Block for Delay Metric Reporting
source: Metric Blocks for use with RTCP's Extended Report Framework RAI
abstract:
This document defines an RTP Control Protocol (RTCP) Extended Report
(XR) block that allows the reporting of delay metrics for use in a
range of Real-time Transport Protocol (RTP) applications.  
[STANDARDS-TRACK]
